title: Should encourage people add to uniswap pool
body:
Currently, there's very few ghst in uniswap pool, this means if I want to buy about 10eth ghst, I have a suffer a high price impact. (about 1%). And if I want to buy 30eth ghst, I need to pay 4% more! 

There should be some incentives to make people willing to stake in uniswap pool. For example $WHALE gives people who add liquidity to uniswap pool some $WHALE every month. This will be a great help.
author: 0xB6227EeC1109d05328d0eB2550107b7AD3ff4c84
